title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Khalil Mack/Anthony Davis trade parallels ; Unknown good for NFL biz; Middlekauff Mailbag
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Khalil Mack/Anthony Davis trade parallels ; Unknown good for NFL biz; Middlekauff Mailbag
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2.  In this episode, Middlekauff explains the parallels between the Anthony Davis NBA trade and the Raiders trading for Khalil Mack, why the NFL's urgency and unkowns are make it more compelling than thee othr major sports, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
